document_data.name: Nok
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nok''' was a [[goblin]] who lived in the [[Lower Heart]] ward of [[Skullport]] in [[Undermountain]] around [[1370 DR]], and twin to [[Nyk]].

Nok and Nyk were a pair of enterprising [[goblin]]s who swept up the dung left by the [[Raging Bull]], a long-imprisoned [[minotaur]] suspended from the ceiling by [[The Deepfires]] inn. They used the dung as manure to grow mushrooms. They would tell stories about failed rescue attempts for a [[copper piece]].
